TopicTitle: Is there anyway I could try make the config where you could convert ore without using a drill?

Articles.Content: Basically, I tried to make a config where I could convert ore without using a driller and I am exactly using an IRSU so that way I could possibly refuel my ship without using the driller

Might as well use the infinite propellant cheat since using ISRU without drills is effectively conjuring fuel out of nothing.

Alternatively, make a ModuleManager patch based on an RTG and set it to generate either ore or fuel, or use the negative thrust KAL-1000 exploit to generate free fuel.
